data.title: Uniting to Save and Sustain Lives
data.text:
Driven by Our Purpose, Destined to Transform

Everything we do converges at the critical intersection where products that save and sustain lives meet the healthcare professionals and caregivers who make it all happen. Now, we support more patients through every point of their journey, with a broad set of solutions that empowers healthcare professionals to deliver smarter, more personalized care. Together, we are transforming healthcare with bold innovations that will help us realize our shared promise to improve care for all.

Our Commitment to Healthcare Professionals and Patients

We are committed to supporting patients and healthcare professionals with innovations that are driven by compassion for their journeys, a passion to improve care and the ambition to transform the future of healthcare.

Products for Healthcare Professionals

Primary Care Go to Primary Care

Supporting every aspect of your clinical practice, including physical exam, diagnostic cardiology, vitals monitoring and vision screening

Go to Primary Care

Hospital Care Go to Hospital Care

Advancing products and technologies designed to speed patient recovery and streamline clinical workflows

Go to Hospital Care

Surgical Care Go to Surgical Care

Delivering innovations that enable reduced operating times, faster patient recovery and improved outcomes

Go to Surgical Care

Kidney Care Go to Kidney Care

Pioneering care in hemodialysis (HD), peritoneal dialysis (PD) and digital health to support better outcomes for your patients

Go to Kidney Care

Nutritional Care Go to Nutritional Care

Personalizing nutritional care designed to improve patients’ health in the hospital, the ICU and at home

Go to Nutritional Care

Respiratory Care Go to Respiratory Care

Helping your patients with respiratory therapies designed to simplify delivery and improve mobility

For Patients

You are our passion. Your stories inspire us to work harder at bringing innovations that can make your experience easier, speed recovery and enable the best possible quality of life.

Discover Patient Stories

More For Patients

General Healthcare Go to General Healthcare

Whether you are receiving care in the hospital, at your doctor’s office or at home, we are here to support every step of your journey.

Nutritional Care Go to Nutritional Care

When medical conditions prevent you from adequately feeding yourself, we provide clinical nutrition options to help you regain your nutritional status.

Go to Nutritional Care

Kidney Care Go to Kidney Care

Kidney disease is an ongoing journey for you and your family. While every journey is unique, Baxter is committed to supporting access to care options to meet your medical and lifestyle needs.

Bringing our Purpose to Life

Our mission to save and sustain lives is reflected in our business priorities and our commitment to be an agent of change at a global level. This means doing what is right for our planet, our patients and customers, our teams and our communities. We put this commitment into action through high-impact philanthropy, diversity, equity and inclusion, nurturing partnerships with the healthcare community and striving for the highest standards of corporate responsibility.
